title: Managing Your Money-How to Choose a RoboAdvisor
description: Can investment management go purely digital? If so, do people need financial advisors? Sarah Max unpacks Barron's fifth annual ranking of roboadvisors in conversation with Beverly Goodman, editorial director of investing and asset management.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Can investment management go purely digital? If so, do people need financial advisors? Sarah Max unpacks Barron's fifth annual ranking of roboadvisors in conversation with Beverly Goodman, editorial director of investing and asset management.
